647ie' hq' - fujr m<jk .eiÜ m;%fha VI fldgfia 2021 j¾Ih i|yd .d,a,-n,msáh Èia;%slalhg wh;a wêlrK l,dmj, cQß iNslhskaf.a 
kdudj,shla isxy," fou< iy bx.%Sis NdIdjkaf.ka m< fõ'
 
647 - B 082523 — 353 (2023/12)
D 1 -
 fuu .eiÜ m;%h www.documents.gov.lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
wxl 2"363 - 2023 foieïn¾ ui 15 jeks isl=rdod - 2023'12'15
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§'&
II fldgi – wêlrK
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
 msgqj  
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 648
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —
  msgqj 
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSï ... ... ...  672
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ oekaùï ... ... ... —
fkd;dßia ,ehsia;= ... ... ... ... —
úúO oekaùï ... ... ... ... — 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jq Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2024 ckjdß ui 05 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2023 foieïn¾ ui 22 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00 g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    206 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmq¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
 .x.dks ,shkf.a"
 rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s'
2023 ckjdß ui 02 jeks Èk"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2023'12'15
648  
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - fudrgqj
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha we;s ±kg jir oyhlg fmr wjika ù we;s my; Wmf,aLkfha ±lafjk kvq jd¾;d 2024 ud¾;= 15 Èfkka 
miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
   02' tfyhska fuys my; Wmf,aLkfha ±lafjk kvq iïnkaOfhka hu md¾Yajlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ iïmQ¾K 
úia;rhla fyda tys hï fldgila ,nd .ekSug wjYH fõ kï" tA i|yd ,sÅ; b,a,Sula 2024 ud¾;= 15 Èkg fmr fuu 
wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; bÈßm;a l<hq;= fõ'
   03' tfia b,a,Sï bÈßm;a fkdjqkfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2024 ud¾;= 15 Èfkka miqj fuu 
wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2023'12'15
672  
msial,a úlsŒï
fudKrd., Èid wêlrKfha § h
isú,a kvq úOdk ix.%y mkf;a 255 jk j.ka;sh wkqj msial,a úiska lrkq ,nk msial,a úlsŒu

§ukdjla f,i Tnf.ka meñ‚,sldßhg wh lr .ekSug whs;sh we;s njg fuu .re wêlrKh ;Skaÿ lr tu ;Skaÿj

ú;a;slrejka'
fld<U jd‚c uydêlrKfha by; wxl ork kvqfõ we;=<;a 2022 la jQ wfm%a,a ui 23 jk Èke;s ;Skaÿj m%ldrj iu:
